article_title: Paranoia-Rama: Gays Invading Disney World, ObamaCare Worse Than 9/11, 'Very Evil' Sex-Ed
article_text: To our readers: The future of the Supreme Court. The most far-right presidential candidates in decades. Non-stop attacks on women’s rights. Never has the work of Right Wing Watch, a project of the People For the American Way dedicated to exposing the Far-Right's extreme and intolerant agenda, been more important. And, as a non-profit, our main source of support is readers like you. If you use Right Wing Watch, please consider making a contribution to support our work at this critical time.

og.title: Paranoia-Rama: Gays Invading Disney World, ObamaCare Worse Than 9/11, 'Very Evil' Sex-Ed

article_metadata.description: RWW’s Paranoia-Rama takes a look at five of the week’s most absurd conspiracy theories from the Right.  As Pride Month begins, we watch in horror as “the Stormtroopers in the homosexual movement” bring back slavery and let gay people vacation at Disney World.

article_summary:
If you use Right Wing Watch, please consider making a contribution to support our work at this critical time.
Never has the work of Right Wing Watch, a project of the People For the American Way dedicated to exposing the Far-Right's extreme and intolerant agenda, been more important.
And, as a non-profit, our main source of support is readers like you.
To our readers: The future of the Supreme Court.
Non-stop attacks on women’s rights.
